description.ko: 액체 빛으로 만들어진 거대한 신경망처럼 어두운 해저 협곡을 가로질러 뻗어 나가는 보랏빛 생물 발광 막의 초현실적인 풍경.
description.en: A sprawling network of violet bioluminescent membranes stretching across a dark oceanic rift, resembling a sentient neural web made of liquid light.

prompt: A sprawling, intricate web of translucent obsidian membranes and pulsating violet-blue plasma veins, resembling a cosmic neural synapse stretched across a dark, abyssal oceanic trench. Bioluminescent liquid light flows through the thin, stretching filaments like data streams. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Features intense subsurface scattering on the gelatinous membranes, caustic light patterns shimmering through the deep indigo water, and global illumination from the cyan core. Cinematic composition with a macro focus on the iridescent, vibrating texture of the organic web.
